content: बंध्य [बंध् --यत्] {@--1@} To be bound or fettered, to be confined or imprisoned; <ls>Y. 2. 243.</ls> {@--2@} To be joined or bound together. {@--3@} To be formed, built or constructed. {@--4@} Detained, under arrest. {@--5@} Barren, unproductive, fruitless, useless (said of persons or things); बंध्यश्रमास्ते <ls>R. 16. 75</ls>; अबंध्ययत्नाश्च बभूवुरत्र ते <ls n="R.">3. 29</ls>; <ls>Ki. 1. 33.</ls> {@--6@} Not having the menses or menstrual discharge. {@--7@} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Deprived or destitute of.
